parametrized_description: Minimize CostProteinBars * x + CostNoodles * y subject to CaloriesProteinBars * x + CaloriesNoodles * y ≥ MinCalories and ProteinProteinBars * x + ProteinNoodles * y ≥ MinProtein, where x and y are non-negative variables representing the number of servings of protein bars and noodles respectively.

CostProteinBars.description: Cost per serving of protein bars

CaloriesProteinBars.description: Calories per serving of protein bars

ProteinProteinBars.description: Protein per serving of protein bars

ServingsNoodles.description: The number of servings of noodles

ServingsProteinBars.description: The number of servings of protein bars

constraints.description: The total calories from protein bars and noodles must be at least MinCalories.
The total protein from protein bars and noodles must be at least MinProtein.

objective.description: The objective is to minimize the total cost of protein bars and noodles while meeting the minimum daily calorie and protein requirements.
